title: Lakshmi Kasula Mala - Auspicious Gold and Kundan Long Necklace
materials: Ruby. Traditional Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring
features: Exquisite Kasula Haaram design featuring intricately crafted gold coins (Kasulu) linked together with a delicate latticework. The centerpiece is a grand Lakshmi pendant, meticulously embellished with Kundan stones and flanked by peacocks. The necklace also features temple design elements, adding a touch of divinity and heritage.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant accents of emerald green
and sparkling white Kundan. This color palette embodies traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of cultural elegance is desired.
description: This Lakshmi Kasula Mala is a timeless heirloom piece, embodying prosperity and blessings. The use of 22K gold ensures lasting value and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural luster, making it a captivating statement piece. The combination of traditional craftsmanship and high-quality materials makes it a durable and treasured possession.
